archiefmat.titel: 'Generael Kerckeboeck van Suriname', bevattend afschriften van akten van doop door de Nederduitse en Franse predikanten van de Hervormde Kerk in Paramaribo, Beneden-Commewijne, Cottica en Perica
archiefmat.titel_eng: 'General Church Register of Suriname', containing copies of certificates of baptism by Dutch and French ministers of the Reformed Church in Paramaribo, Lower Commewijne, Cottica and Perica
archiefmat.notes: Both volumes contain an alphabetical index of names.
